data.title: Better Service Better Boating
data.meta_description: DYS believes yacht owners deserve the support of a yacht service provider committed to offering the best means and methods in the boating and marine industry.
data.text:
Complete Boating Services for Vessels of All Sizes in SW Florida

Since its founding in 1994, Diversified Yacht Services, Inc. maintains, repairs, and upgrades luxury yachts and vessels of all sizes in Fort Myers Beach, Florida. Onsite boating services offered from the state-of-the-art, 60,000-square-foot service center christened in 2012 include regular maintenance, mechanical installs and repairs, electronic installs and repairs, varnish services, cosmetic services, and a 150-ton travel lift. A marina, full-service fuel dock, and well stocked ship’s store complete this one-stop shop for comprehensive marine services in Southwest Florida.

Diversified Yacht Services, Inc. (DYS) was founded on three guiding principles incorporated into our daily operations:

The DYS Three Guiding Principles

Dedication to the highest quality service

Unparalleled reliability

Commitment to earn your trust

We believe boat owners deserve the support of a service provider committed to offering the best means and methods in the boating and marine industry. This belief is counterbalanced through an appreciation for traditional maintenance techniques with an eye toward safety and reliability.

Our Pledge

Our Pledge

At DYS, our pledge to clients is “Better Service—Better Boating.” Better means we listen and respond, make service convenient, take pride in our work, invest in our technicians, and offer the best products and services at a fair price.

We recognize few possessions are more important to a boat owner and understand that taking care of your vessel can be difficult at times. DYS strives to make your experience better with two convenient Southwest Florida locations, including our flagship marina at Fort Myers Beach and mobile dockside service for Southwest Florida and beyond.

Our technicians are factory certified and receive continuing education to stay up to date on the latest technology. When you need parts, our two parts departments offer the largest selection of OEM parts and the best customer service support in Southwest Florida.

Need Parts?

Need Parts?

Our two parts departments are available to help with the largest selection of OEM parts and the best customer service support available anywhere in Southwest Florida.

It is our goal to continuously strive to be better by offering the best products and service at a fair price.

DYS Locations

DYS Services

Trained in all aspects of boat repair and service, our technicians are true career professionals. Their depth of experience is extraordinary: mechanical engineering, design and construction, marine installation procedures, all aspects of rigging, project management, and personal involvement throughout the boating and yachting community.

Additionally, DYS is a recognized service dealer for Volvo Penta, Mercury, Suzuki, Seven Marine, Scania, Fischer Panda® generators, as well as an Authorized Yanmar® Industrial Engine Service Dealer and WesterbekeTM Authorized Dealer.

DYS Memberships

American Boat and Yacht Council

Marine Industries Association of Florida

American Boat Builders & Repairers Association
